title: Bug 50793 - Invalid DispatchType in ServletRequestListener on async dispatch
description: When a ServletRequestListener is defined and is invoked after a call to AsyncContext.dispatch(), the DispatcherType returned from the ServletRequest is REQUEST instead of ASYNC.
OB: The issue occurs when a ServletRequestListener is defined and is invoked after a call to AsyncContext.dispatch(). Instead of returning ASYNC, the DispatcherType returned from the ServletRequest is REQUEST.
EB: The expected behavior is that the DispatcherType returned from the ServletRequest after a call to AsyncContext.dispatch() should be ASYNC.
SR: To fix this issue, the ServletRequest should return the correct DispatcherType (ASYNC) after a call to AsyncContext.dispatch().
